property.name: at.set-microphone-gain
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=positionne le gain microphone request=AT+VGT=250\r

property.name: at.call-line-presentation
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=presentation du numero appelant request=AT+CLIP=1\r

property.name: at.set-default-melody
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=selection melodie par defaut,selection 'speaker' comme player par defaut request=AT+WCDM=9,1

property.name: at.set-default-player
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=speaker player par defaut request=AT+WCDP=1

property.name: at.melody9
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=test melodie n°9 request=AT+CRMP=0,15,0,9

property.name: at.melody10
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=test melodie n°10 request=AT+CRMP=0,15,0,10

property.name: at.listen-mode-on
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=active l'ecoute discrete request=AT

property.name: at.listen-mode-off
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=desactive l'ecoute discrete request=AT

property.name: at.volume0
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=change le volume en sortie de speaker request=AT+VGR=255

property.name: at.volume1
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=change le volume en sortie de speaker request=AT+VGR=180

property.name: at.volume2
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=change le volume en sortie de speaker request=AT+VGR=80

property.name: at.volume3
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=change le volume en sortie de speaker request=AT+VGR=50

property.name: at.volume4
property.value: #Wed May 20 14:14:34 CEST 2009 desc=change le volume en sortie de speaker request=AT+VGR=35
